summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4398 for the improvement of Madison Street, from 5th Avenue to Broadway; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the installation of a street lighting system; under Ordinance No. 52025, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
